text: Everybody Saves Father and The Only Girl in Camp is a 1910 American silent comedy movie.EVERYBODY SAVES FATHER It stars G.W. Abbe, Justus D. Barnes, Frank H. Crane, Irene Crane, and Marie Eline. ==References== Category:1910 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies
title: Everybody Saves Father and The Only Girl in Camp
